changelog.en:
## SimpleCLSX v1.0.3

### Updater System Improvements
- **Auto-restart after updates**: Application now automatically restarts after successful updates
- **Fixed duplicate update prompts**: App properly tracks installed version to prevent repeated update notifications
- **Dynamic version display**: About dialog now shows current installed version and updates automatically
- **Version tracking**: Persistent version storage prevents update loops
- **Enhanced update workflow**: Seamless update experience with proper restart handling

### Bug Fixes
- Fixed version inconsistency between different parts of the application
- Resolved compilation errors in About dialog
- Improved version string parsing and display
- Fixed update controller version management

### Technical Improvements
- Unified version source from constants.h
- Added markUpdateInstalled() method for post-update version tracking
- Enhanced UpdateController with persistent settings
- Improved version comparison logic

### Update Instructions
- This update will automatically restart the application after installation
- Check Help â†’ About to verify your current version after update

## SimpleCLSX v1.0.2

### New Features
- Added OTA (Over-The-Air) update system
- Automatic update checking on startup
- Manual update check via Help menu (Ctrl+U)
- Update progress dialog with detailed status
- Automatic backup before updates
- Rollback capability on update failure

### Improvements
- Enhanced error handling for updates
- Better network connectivity checks
- Improved update manifest validation
- Added SHA256 verification for downloads
- Optimized update file extraction

### Bug Fixes
- Fixed potential crash during update download
- Resolved update dialog display issues
- Corrected version comparison logic

## SimpleCLSX v1.0.1

### Bug Fixes
- Fixed build system to use correct Qt MinGW compiler
- Resolved libwdi.dll path configuration issues
- Corrected library paths for proper linking

### Improvements
- Enhanced build process stability
- Improved deployment scripts
- Better error handling in release workflow

## SimpleCLSX v1.0.0 - Initial Release

### Features
- RGB color control with real-time preview
- Brightness adjustment (0-255 levels)
- 7 preset colors for quick access
- Sequence playback (built-in and custom)
- Custom .raw sequence upload support
- Firmware update with DFU support
- Automatic driver installation (Windows)
- Dark mode interface
- Professional OTA update system

## SimpleCLSX v1.0.3 Beta

### Same as Stable v1.0.3
This beta release matches the stable release.

### Updater System Improvements
- **Auto-restart after updates**: Application now automatically restarts after successful updates
- **Fixed duplicate update prompts**: App properly tracks installed version to prevent repeated update notifications
- **Dynamic version display**: About dialog now shows current installed version and updates automatically
- **Enhanced update workflow**: Seamless update experience with proper restart handling

### How to Switch Channels
1. Go to Help â†’ Update Settings
2. Change Update Channel to Beta
3. Click Check for Updates
